metadata.titleEn: Geochemical data set of Paleozoic-Early Mesozoic sedimentary rocks  in Yunnan Ailaoshan and Baoshan area (202-543 Ma)
metadata.titleCn: 云南哀牢山-保山地区古生代-早中生代地层地球化学数据集（202-543 Ma）
metadata.description: The data set includes: longitude and latitude, lithological information, chronological data, O isotope composition and major and trace element composition of sedimentary rock samples from Permian Triassic and Cambrian Silurian clastic strata in Ailaoshan structural belt and Baoshan area, Yunnan Province. The chronological data of rock samples are determined by laser ablation plasma mass spectrometry (la-mc-icpms) of detrital zircon, and the error of Single Zircon 91500 is less than 5%; The main elements were determined by X-ray fluorescence spectrometer (XRF) by melting the rock powder into a glass sheet which can be tested on the computer. The analytical accuracy of the standard materials gbw-07111, gbw-123, gsr-1, gsr-2 and gsr-3 was better than 2%; Trace elements were analyzed by Perkin Elmer Elan 6000 inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS). In the process of analysis and test, USGS reference materials (bhvo-2, avg-2, gsr-1, gsr-2, gsr-3, gsd-9 and sarm-4) were determined. As the external test standard, the element content of the test sample was more accurate than 3%. The oxygen isotope data are obtained by SIMS of detrital zircon. The external accuracy of the multiple determination results of Penglai standard sample is better than 0.30 ‰ (2 σ，  n = 24)。 The obtained detrital zircon age spectrum of Permian Triassic clastic sedimentary rocks in Ailaoshan, as well as major and trace element compositions, can be used to effectively limit the evolution process of ancient Tethys Ailaoshan Ocean from subduction to closure, which has been published in international well-known journals such as tectonics, GSA bulletin and Journal of Asian Earth Sciences, And the famous domestic journal geotectonics and mineralization. The data can be widely used in the future to limit the study of the evolution history of the paleo ocean basin. The obtained detrital zircon age spectrum and Hf isotope data of Cambrian Devonian clastic rocks in Baoshan area can be used to effectively limit the tectonic position of Baoshan block in the early Paleozoic. The relevant data have been published in the well-known domestic journal Acta petrologica, and the data can be widely used in the reconstruction of Gondwana continent in the future.
metadata.descriptionCn: 该数据集包含了：云南哀牢山构造带二叠纪-三叠纪以及保山地区寒武纪-志留纪碎屑地层的沉积岩样品的经纬度、岩石岩性信息、样品年代学数据和O同位素组成、样品主微量元素组成。岩石样品的年代学数据是通过对碎屑锆石进行激光剥蚀等离子体质谱（LA-MC-ICPMS）测定的，对标准样品单颗粒锆石91500测试的误差优于5%；主量元素通过将岩石粉末熔融成可上机测试的玻璃片，用X射线荧光光谱仪（XRF）进行测定，对于标准物质GBW-07111、 GBW-123、 GSR-1、 GSR-2 和 GSR-3 的测量结果分析精度优于 2%；微量元素通过在 Perkin-Elmer ELAN 6000电感耦合等离子体质谱仪（ICP-MS）上进行。分析测试过程中对USGS 标准物质（BHVO-2、 AVG-2、 GSR-1、 GSR-2、 GSR-3、 GSD-9 和 SARM-4） 进行测定，作为外部测试标样较正测试样品的元素含量，分析测试精度优于 3%。氧同位素数据是通过对碎屑锆石进行二次离子质谱（SIMS）所获得的，测试过程中，Penglai 标样的多次测定结果的外部精度优于 0.30‰(2σ， n = 24)。所获得的的哀牢山二叠纪-三叠纪碎屑沉积岩的碎屑锆石年龄谱，以及主微量元素组成可以用来有效限制古特提斯哀牢山洋从俯冲到闭合的演化过程，目前已经发表在国际知名期刊Tectonics、GSA Bulletin和Journal of Asian Earth Sciences，和国内著名期刊《大地构造与成矿》之上。数据将来可被广泛引用，用于限制古洋盆的演化历史研究。所获得的的保山地区的寒武纪-泥盆纪碎屑岩的碎屑锆石年龄谱以及Hf同位素数据可以用来有效限制保山地块在早古生代的大地构造位置，相关数据已经发表在国内知名期刊《岩石学报》上，数据将来可被广泛引用，用于进行冈瓦纳大陆重建的工作中去。

File name: rock longitude and latitude, major and trace element content, zircon age data and zircon oxygen isotope data are stored in Excel format, and the file name is "Paleozoic early Mesozoic stratigraphic geochemical data set (2016-2019) in Ailaoshan Baoshan area, Yunnan Province"
Data reading mode: it can be directly opened by Microsoft Excel

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the methods used to determine the geochemical characteristics of sedimentary rock samples from the Paleozoic to Early Mesozoic eras in a dataset?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于确定来自古生代到早中生代时代的沉积岩样本的地球化学特征的方法有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: LA-MC-ICPMS for zircon age data, XRF for major elements, ICP-MS for trace elements, SIMS for oxygen isotope data
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: LA-MC-ICPMS用于锆石年龄数据，XRF用于主元素，ICP-MS用于微量元素，SIMS用于氧同位素数据。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the measurement precision for main elements when using X-ray fluorescence spectrometry in a dataset focusing on sedimentary rock samples from geological regions?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在针对地质区域的沉积岩样本的数据集中，使用X射线荧光光谱法时，主要元素的测量精度是多少？

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods using laser ablation multi-collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-MC-ICPMS) for zircon dating compare to those using secondary ion mass spectrometry (SIMS) for oxygen isotope data in terms of precision and applicability in geological studies?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 激光烧蚀多收集电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-MC-ICPMS）用于锆石定年与次级离子质谱法（SIMS）用于氧同位素数据的采集方法在精度和地质研究的适用性方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The data collection method using LA-MC-ICPMS for zircon dating provides precise age data with an error margin better than 5% for standard samples, making it highly useful for establishing detailed age spectra of sedimentary rocks. Meanwhile, the SIMS technique for collecting oxygen isotope data achieves an external precision of better than 0.30‰ for multiple determinations of the standard sample Penglai, which is crucial for understanding isotopic variations. Both methods are applicable in geological studies, but LA-MC-ICPMS is primarily focused on dating, whereas SIMS is focused on isotopic composition.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 使用LA-MC-ICPMS进行锆石定年的数据收集方法提供了精确的年龄数据，标准样品的误差范围优于5%，这使其在建立沉积岩详细年龄谱方面非常有用。同时，SIMS技术在收集氧同位素数据时，对于标准样品Penglai的多次测定外部精度优于0.30‰，这对于理解同位素变化至关重要。这两种方法都适用于地质研究，但LA-MC-ICPMS主要侧重于定年，而SIMS则侧重于同位素组成。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can be inferred about the tectonic evolution processes from the geochemical patterns observed in the sedimentary rock samples collected from the Permian-Triassic Ailao Shan tectonic zone and the Cambrian-Silurian Baoshan area?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 从收集的来自二叠纪-三叠纪的艾劳山构造带和寒武纪-志留纪的保山地区的沉积岩样本中观察到的地球化学模式，可以推断出有关构造演化过程的信息。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The geochemical patterns, including detrital zircon age spectra and major and trace element compositions, can be used to effectively constrain the evolution process of the Paleo-Tethys Ailao Shan ocean from subduction to closure. These patterns have been published in international journals like Tectonics, GSA Bulletin, and Journal of Asian Earth Sciences, indicating their significance in understanding the tectonic evolution. Additionally, the detrital zircon age spectra and Hf isotopic data from the Baoshan area's Cambrian-Devonian sedimentary rocks can be instrumental in determining the tectonic position of the Baoshan block during the Early Paleozoic, and these findings have been published in the domestic journal 'Acta Petrologica Sinica', showing potential for future research on Gondwana reconstruction.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 地球化学模式，包括碎屑锆石年龄谱和主要及微量元素组成，可以有效地约束古特提斯艾劳山洋从俯冲到闭合的演化过程。这些模式已在《构造学》、《地质学会公报》和《亚洲地球科学杂志》等国际期刊上发表，表明它们在理解构造演化方面的重要性。此外，来自保山地区寒武纪-泥盆纪沉积岩的碎屑锆石年龄谱和Hf同位素数据对于确定早古生代保山块体的构造位置具有重要意义，这些发现已发表在国内期刊《岩石学报》上，显示出未来在冈瓦纳重建方面的研究潜力。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential impacts on geochemical data accuracy when using detrital zircon age data from laser ablation multi-collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-MC-ICPMS) compared to other dating methods?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用激光剥蚀多收集器电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-MC-ICPMS）获得的碎屑锆石年龄数据与其他测年方法相比，可能对地球化学数据的准确性产生哪些潜在影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using detrital zircon age data from laser ablation multi-collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-MC-ICPMS) can result in high precision with errors better than 5% for standard samples like single grain zircon 91500, potentially leading to more accurate age determination of sedimentary rock samples from regions such as Yunnan's Ailaoshan-Baoshan areas. This accuracy is crucial for understanding the evolution from subduction to closure of ancient oceanic basins like the Paleo-Tethys Ocean.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用激光剥蚀多收集器电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-MC-ICPMS）获得的碎屑锆石年龄数据可以实现高精度，标准样品如单颗锆石91500的误差可低于5%，这可能导致对云南的哀牢山-保山地区沉积岩样品的年龄测定更加准确。这种准确性对于理解古洋盆（如古特提斯洋）从俯冲到闭合的演化过程至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary objective of collecting geochemical data from sedimentary rock samples in the Ailao Mountain-Baoshan region for understanding Paleozoic to early Mesozoic stratigraphic evolution?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集来自哀牢山-保山地区沉积岩样本的地球化学数据的主要目的是为了理解古生代到早中生代的地层演化。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objective is to effectively constrain the evolution of the Paleo-Tethys Ailao Mountain ocean from subduction to closure, utilizing the detrital zircon age spectra and major-trace element compositions obtained from the sedimentary rock samples. This data can be widely cited in research studying the evolutionary history of ancient ocean basins.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是有效约束古特提斯阿依劳山洋从俯冲到闭合的演化过程，利用从沉积岩样本中获得的碎屑锆石年龄谱和主要-微量元素组成。这些数据可以广泛引用于研究古洋盆演化历史的研究中。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are followed to collect and analyze geochemical data from sedimentary rock samples in the field of stratigraphy and geochemistry of ancient geological formations?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn:
在古地质构造的层序地层学和地球化学领域，收集和分析沉积岩样品的地球化学数据时，通常遵循以下程序：

1. **样品采集**：在野外选择合适的地质剖面，使用适当的工具（如铲子、钻机等）采集沉积岩样品。确保样品代表性，并记录采样位置的地理坐标和地层信息。

2. **样品处理**：将采集的岩石样品进行清洗，去除表面污染物。根据需要将样品切割成小块或粉碎成粉末，以便于后续分析。

3. **样品保存**：将处理后的样品放入干燥、清洁的容器中，标记清楚以防混淆，并在适当的条件下保存，避免样品变质。

4. **实验室分析**：将样品送往实验室进行地球化学分析。常用的分析方法包括：
   - **X射线荧光光谱（XRF）**：用于测定样品中元素的含量。
   - **质谱分析**：用于同位素分析和元素丰度测定。
   - **化学溶解法**：用于提取特定元素或化合物。

5. **数据处理与分析**：对实验室获得的数据进行整理和统计分析，使用软件工具进行数据可视化和解释。

6. **结果解释**：结合地质背景和沉积环境，分析地球化学数据，推断古环境、沉积过程及其与地层的关系。

7. **报告撰写**：将研究结果整理成报告或论文，详细描述研究方法、数据分析和结论。

8. **数据存档与共享**：将研究数据存档，并根据需要与其他研究人员共享，以促进科学交流和进一步研究。
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: In the field of stratigraphy and geochemistry of ancient geological formations, the procedures to collect and analyze geochemical data from sedimentary rock samples involve several steps: determining the location and collecting sedimentary rock samples, identifying rock lithology, obtaining geochronological data through LA-MC-ICPMS on detrital zircon with an error margin better than 5%, measuring major elements by fusing rock powder into testable glass disks and analyzing them using X-ray fluorescence spectrometry (XRF) with an accuracy better than 2%, analyzing trace elements using ICP-MS with an accuracy better than 3%, and obtaining oxygen isotope data through SIMS on detrital zircon with an external precision better than 0.30‰.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在古代地质形成的地层学和地球化学领域，收集和分析沉积岩样品的地球化学数据的程序包括几个步骤：确定位置并收集沉积岩样品，识别岩石岩性，通过LA-MC-ICPMS获得碎屑锆石的地质年代数据，误差范围优于5%；通过将岩石粉末熔融成可测试的玻璃圆盘并使用X射线荧光光谱法（XRF）分析主要元素，准确度优于2%；使用ICP-MS分析微量元素，准确度优于3%；通过SIMS对碎屑锆石获得氧同位素数据，外部精度优于0.30‰。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements or methodologies have enabled the precise determination of sample geochemistry and isotopic composition in stratigraphic studies of ancient geological formations?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步或方法论使得在古代地质构造的层序研究中能够精确确定样本的地球化学和同位素组成？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of laser ablation multi-collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-MC-ICPMS) has enabled precise determination of zircon age data, with an error margin of less than 5% for standard samples. Additionally, the main elements are measured by X-ray fluorescence spectrometer (XRF) with an accuracy of better than 2% for standard materials, and trace elements are analyzed using Perkin-Elmer ELAN 6000 inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometer (ICP-MS) with an accuracy better than 3% for standard materials. Secondary ion mass spectrometry (SIMS) provides oxygen isotope data with an external precision better than 0.30‰ (2σ, n = 24).
Enablement.AnswerCn: 激光烧蚀多收集感应耦合等离子体质谱（LA-MC-ICPMS）的使用使得锆石年龄数据的精确测定成为可能，标准样品的误差范围小于5%。此外，主要元素通过X射线荧光光谱仪（XRF）进行测量，标准材料的准确度优于2%；微量元素则使用Perkin-Elmer ELAN 6000感应耦合等离子体质谱仪（ICP-MS）进行分析，标准材料的准确度优于3%。次级离子质谱（SIMS）提供的氧同位素数据外部精度优于0.30‰（2σ，n = 24）。
